span.a: ding Between the LIONS, with the Senior class of SRHS 2020

div.h2: Welcome to Santa Rosa Consolidated Schools

span.strong: Welcome to Santa Rosa Consolidated School’s website! We invite our parents, guardians, guests and alumni to browse our website so that one can become familiar with the many educational opportunities that are available to our students. Also, find and follow us on Facebook @Santa Rosa Consolidated Schools.

span.br: At Santa Rosa Consolidated Schools we work together to educate our 650 students in a safe and supportive environment. We pledge our best to educate, empower, and enable all students to become caring, contributing citizens who can succeed in an ever-changing world. The demands of an ever-changing world are steering our approach to excellence. Santa Rosa Consolidated Schools is committed to focusing on high expectations, individual academic success, and to creating a community of respect and responsibility.

strong.span: Together, in UNITY, we form a strong partnership to ensure that all Santa Rosa Consolidated Schools students receive an exceptional education. I encourage you to participate in school activities and special occasions as well as volunteer in your child’s classroom as your schedule allows. We invite all parents, grandparents and our community to join us in creating opportunities to learn and grow. I look forward to continuing to work with you this school year and many school years to come. Please contact me at (575) 472-3171 or email me at mmadrid@srlions.com if we can be of any assistance.

Yours in Leadership and Learning,
Mr. Martin A. Madrid
S.R.C.S. Superintendent
